title: F/S - T201's Nice Shape REDUCED!!! (Cobb and Other HOF!!!!!)

posts.post_title: F/S - T201's Nice Shape REDUCED!!! (Cobb and Other HOF!!!!!)
posts.post_content:
I have the following T201's for outright sale that are in really nice condition as described and shown.  Prices include shipping and insurance.  PayPal (Gift Only) or checks / money orders are acceptable.  Cards include:

Huggins / Breshnahan - EXMT - $210
Brown / Hofman - EX+ - $110
Evers / Chance - EX - SOLD!
Crawford / Cobb - EX+ - $710
Lush / Hauser - EX - A couple of light surface indentations (pencil point size) that don't break the paper - $35
Summers / Jennings - EX - $85
